TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MainMenu extends System.Windows.Forms.Menu

span.span: Represents the menu structure of a form.

summary.span: 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示窗体菜单结构的容器。The control represents the container for the menu structure of a form. 菜单组成表示菜单结构中的各个菜单命令的对象。A menu is composed of objects that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure. 每个可以是你的应用程序的命令或其他子菜单项的父菜单。Each can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items. 若要将绑定到，将显示它，将分配到属性。To bind the to the that will display it, assign the to the property of the . 对于应用程序将支持多种语言，你可以使用属性显示的菜单从右到左，以支持诸如阿拉伯语之类的语言的文本。For applications that will have support for multiple languages, you can use the property to display the text of the menu from right to left to support languages such as Arabic. 你可以创建不同对象来表示你的窗体的不同的菜单结构。You can create different objects to represent different menu structures for your form. 如果你想要重复使用包含在特定的菜单结构，你可以使用其方法来创建副本。If you want to reuse the menu structure contained in a specific , you can use its method to create a copy. 菜单结构的副本之后，你可以为新的菜单结构来进行适当的修改。Once you have a copy of the menu structure, you can make the appropriate modifications for your new menu structure. > [!NOTE] > 剪切和粘贴到设计器中的另一种形式中的项可能无法按预期方式将粘贴到窗体如果没有定义任何菜单项的菜单。Cutting and pasting menu items from one form to another in the designer might not work as expected if the form you are pasting into has no menu items defined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，将两个分配对象添加到并将其绑定到窗体。The following code example creates a , assigns two objects to the and binds it to a form. 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.MainMenu Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的构造函数创建没有任何指定对象。This version of the constructor creates a without any specified objects. 若要添加到控件的菜单项使用接受一个数组此构造函数的其他版本对象作为其参数或使用方法属性。To add menu items to the control use the other version of this constructor that accepts an array of objects as its parameter or use the method of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，将两个分配对象添加到并将其绑定到窗体。The following code example creates a , assigns two objects to the and binds it to a form. 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此构造函数分配的数组对象添加到时创建。You can use this constructor to assign an array of objects to the at the time of its creation. 后已创建你可以添加其他对象添加到使用方法属性。After the has been created you can add additional objects to the using the method of the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，并将两个分配对象添加到使用此版本的构造函数。The following code example creates a , and assigns two objects to the using this version of the constructor. 该示例然后将绑定到。The example then binds the to a . 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`Form1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `Form1`. Public Overridable Function CloneMenu () As MainMenu

summary.span: 创建一个新 ，它是当前 的副本。

span.span: Creates a new that is a duplicate of the current .
A that represents the cloned menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法创建一份存储中的菜单结构。You can use this method to create a copy of the menu structure stored in a . 你可以使用此方法以重用存储中的菜单结构作为新的基础。You can use this method to reuse the menu structure stored in a as the foundation for a new . 例如，如果你想要创建的菜单结构具有相同的菜单项与现有但还有其他对象添加到它，你可以使用方法来创建一份原始和然后添加新到克隆的对象。For example, if you want to create a menu structure that has the same menu items as an existing but will also have additional objects added to it, you can use the method to create a copy of the original and then add the new objects to the cloned . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法可确定当前父级到窗体。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果在示例中调用代码到不返回`null`，代码然后克隆的菜单结构使用方法。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 代码随后设置属性设置为 true; 如果的新副本的创建可以用于支持从右到左的文本的语言。The code then sets the property to true on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`mainMenu1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Collapse As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the main menu collapses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`MainMenu1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `MainMenu1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#483](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#483)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#483](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#483)]

summary.span: 处置由 占用的资源（内存除外）。

span.span: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则为资源是使用不会被释放之前垃圾集合调用对象的析构函数。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's destructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.Form GetForm() cil managed

returns.span: 如果 当前没有在窗体上寄宿，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the is not currently hosted on a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定是否为特定有父级到窗体。This property enables you to determine if a specific is parented to a form. 属性通常是时使用多个在窗体上使用对象和你需要确定窗体当前正在使用哪一个。The property is typically used when multiple objects are being used on a form and you need to determine which one is currently being used by a form. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法可确定当前父级到窗体。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果在示例中调用代码到不返回`null`，代码然后克隆的菜单结构使用方法。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 代码随后设置属性设置为 true; 如果的新副本的创建可以用于支持从右到左的文本的语言。The code then sets the property to true on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`mainMenu1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.GetForm Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnCollapse (e As EventArgs)
protected public: virtual void OnCollapse(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft RightToLeft { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property RightToLeft As RightToLeft
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft RightToLeft { System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::RightToLeft value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件显示的文本是否从右向左显示。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the text displayed by the control is displayed from right to left.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使你菜单以支持写入从右到左的语言。This property enables your menus to support languages that are written from right to left. 当此属性设置为`RightToLeft.Yes`，菜单项文本将显示从右到左而不是从左到右的方法的默认值。When this property is set to `RightToLeft.Yes`, the menu item text will be displayed from right to left instead of the default left to right method. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何启用从右到左对齐方式会影响 Windows 窗体控件的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about how enabling right-to-left alignment affects Windows Forms controls, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法可确定当前父级到窗体。The following code example uses the method to determine if a is currently parented to the form. 如果在示例中调用代码到不返回`null`，代码然后克隆的菜单结构使用方法。If the call in the example code to does not return `null`, the code then clones the menu structure of the using the method. 示例代码随后设置属性`RightToLeft.Yes`上的新副本的创建可以用于支持从右到左的文本的语言。The example code then sets the property to `RightToLeft.Yes` on the new copy of the to create a that can be used for languages that support right to left text. 此示例要求你拥有创建命名为`mainMenu1`。This example requires that you have a created that is named `mainMenu1`. [!code-cpp[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MainMenu.RightToLeft Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配给该属性的值不是 枚举的有效成员。

span.span: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the enumeration.
